description: Turbo Select Dispense is a high-speed dispensing runtime phase that enables operators to rapidly dispense materials, now with support for lot-tracked materials.
intent: Allow the operator to perform a fast 'turbo' dispense of material into WIP containers, support dispensing of lot-tracked materials, and optionally require re-taring each new WIP container when configured.
example_usage: Operator opens the Turbo Select Dispense phase, selects a lot-tracked source container, enters the dispense quantity, and—if configured—re-tares the new WIP container before committing the dispense.
